FAQ.Question: How do I register for a course?
FAQ.Answer: Find the course by searching or browsing and then click ‘Enroll’

FAQ.Question: How do I add or remove a skill?
FAQ.Answer: DXC should not want to receive another party’s confidential information because DXC will then have the burden to maintain that information as confidential, and DXC’s freedom of invention and action may be compromised because of knowing such confidential information. However, in situations where it is necessary for DXC to receive such sensitive information from another party, a proper Confidential Disclosure Agreement (CDA) should be executed before receiving such information. Please refer to the “Receiving Sensitive Information” section in the DXC Confidential Information Policy.

FAQ.Question: Where do I find all the training assets for the Skill Profile updating?
FAQ.Answer:
• All training assets are located on the myDXC Skills Management Page.
• Be sure to read the ReadMe First document for descriptions of each asset.

FAQ.Question: What do I do if my course does not launch automatically?
FAQ.Answer: Please contact your DXC Legal Attorney or Contracts Negotiator. DXC Legal professionals are assigned by business unit, function and geographic location. Please direct your technical questions here.
